name: Chargrilled Chicken Ciabatta
author: Borden® Cheese
summary: Grilled chicken breast halves are served on ciabatta sandwich rolls with sun-dried tomato mayonnaise and spring greens dressed in balsamic vinaigrette.
ingredients: 4 (4 ounce) boneless, skinless chicken breast halves
1 (8 ounce) package Borden® Mozzarella Cheese Slices
2 cups packaged spring mix lettuce blend
½ cup prepared sun-dried tomato mayonnaise
1  ripe avocado, pitted, peeled and sliced  (Optional)
directions: Season chicken breasts with chicken seasoning
Grill over medium heat for 5 to 8 minutes on each side or until fully internal temperature reaches 165 degrees F
Top chicken with sliced cheese keep on grill until cheese melts; remove from grill and keep warm
Brush cut sides of rolls lightly with oil; grill for 1 minute
Toss lettuce blend and tomatoes with vinaigrette in a medium bowl
Spread mayonnaise equally on cut sides of sandwich rolls
Layer lettuce blend, grilled chicken breast and avocado slices (optional) on each roll
